name: HSP_ACCT_ADMIT_DX
description: This table contains hospital account admit diagnoses from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple admission diagnoses can be stored in one hospital account, each diagnosis will have a unique line number.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for admission diagnosis stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_TEXT
columns.description: A text description of an admission diagnosis stored in the hospital account.
